/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings in the distance. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of human presence to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
